item.title: Bulk Delete Twitter Messages
item.author: Author
item.description: Hey, are you leaving Twitter? Are you worried that with 80% of the staff gone, it’s just a matter of time until there start being unreported breaches? (Heck, maybe there have already!) Want to ensure anyone breaking into your account doesn’t read your messages? Have a bulk-delete script, on the house! To use this, go to the messages page on a computer. Right click somewhere on the page, and choose “inspect element” to get the developer tools to come up.
